016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.handlebars.providers;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.handlebars.helpers.OptionalValueResolver;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.client.HyperSchemaClient;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.hyperschema.HyperSchema;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.json.JsonElement;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.providers.JsonNodeMessageBodyReader;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.Link;
024import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode;
025import com.github.jknack.handlebars.Context;
026import com.github.jknack.handlebars.Handlebars;
027import jakarta.inject.Inject;
028import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
029import jakarta.ws.rs.InternalServerErrorException;
030import jakarta.ws.rs.Produces;
031import jakarta.ws.rs.WebApplicationException;
032import jakarta.ws.rs.client.Client;
033import jakarta.ws.rs.client.ClientBuilder;
034import jakarta.ws.rs.container.ContainerRequestContext;
035import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MediaType;
036import jakarta.ws.rs.core.MultivaluedMap;
037import jakarta.ws.rs.core.UriInfo;
038import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.MessageBodyWriter;
039import jakarta.ws.rs.ext.Provider;
040import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
041import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
042import org.glassfish.jersey.server.ExtendedUriInfo;
043import org.glassfish.jersey.uri.UriTemplate;
044
045import java.io.IOException;
046import java.io.OutputStream;
047import java.io.OutputStreamWriter;
048import java.lang.annotation.Annotation;
049import java.lang.reflect.Type;
050import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
051import java.util.List;
052import java.util.Optional;
053
054import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.jsonapi.JsonApiRels.describedby;
055
056
057@Singleton
058@Provider
059@Produces(MediaType.TEXT_HTML)
060public class HandlebarsJsonApiMessageBodyWriter
061        implements MessageBodyWriter<JsonElement> {
062
063    private static final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(HandlebarsJsonApiMessageBodyWriter.class);
064
065    private final Client client;
066    private final Handlebars handlebars;
067    private final jakarta.inject.Provider<ContainerRequestContext> requestContext;
068
069    @Inject
070    public HandlebarsJsonApiMessageBodyWriter(Handlebars handlebars,
071                                              jakarta.inject.Provider<ContainerRequestContext> requestContext,
072                                              ClientBuilder clientBuilder) {
073        this.handlebars = handlebars;
074        this.requestContext = requestContext;
075        client = clientBuilder
076                .register(JsonNodeMessageBodyReader.class)
077                .build();
078    }
079
080    @Override
081    public boolean isWriteable(Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations, MediaType mediaType) {
082        return JsonElement.class.isAssignableFrom(type) && mediaType.isCompatible(MediaType.TEXT_HTML_TYPE);
083    }
084
085    @Override
086    public void writeTo(JsonElement jsonElement, Class<?> type, Type genericType, Annotation[] annotations,
087                        MediaType mediaType, MultivaluedMap<String, Object> httpHeaders,
088                        OutputStream entityStream) throws IOException, WebApplicationException {
089
090        Context.Builder builder = Context.newBuilder(jsonElement)
091                .push(OptionalValueResolver.INSTANCE);
092
093        // Check if we have a JSON Schema
094        getSchema(jsonElement, httpHeaders).ifPresent(link ->
095        {
096            HyperSchema hyperSchema = new HyperSchemaClient(client).get(link).toCompletableFuture().join();
097            builder.combine("schema", hyperSchema);
098        });
099
100        Context context = builder.build();
101
102        OutputStreamWriter writer = new OutputStreamWriter(entityStream, StandardCharsets.UTF_8);
103        String path = "jsonapi" + calculateTemplate(requestContext.get().getUriInfo());
104        try {
105            handlebars.compile(path).apply(context, writer);
106        } catch (IOException e) {
107
108            String templateName = jsonElement.getClass().getSimpleName().toLowerCase();
109            handlebars.compile("jsonapi/" + templateName).apply(context, writer);
110        }
111
112        writer.close();
113    }
114
115    private Optional<Link> getSchema(JsonElement jsonElement, MultivaluedMap<String, Object> httpHeaders) {
116        JsonNode schema = jsonElement.json().path("links").path(describedby);
117        if (!schema.isMissingNode()) {
118            return Optional.of(new Link(describedby, schema));
119        }
120
121        return Optional.ofNullable(httpHeaders.get("Link"))
122                .flatMap(list -> list.stream()
123                        .map(jakarta.ws.rs.core.Link.class::cast)
124                        .filter(link -> link.getRel().equals(describedby))
125                        .findFirst()
126                        .map(link -> new Link(link.getRel(), link.getUri().toASCIIString())));
127    }
128
129    protected String calculateTemplate(UriInfo uriInfo) {
130        String htmlTemplateResult = "";
131
132        if (uriInfo instanceof ExtendedUriInfo) {
133            ExtendedUriInfo extendedUriInfo = (ExtendedUriInfo) uriInfo;
134            htmlTemplateResult = calculateTemplateFromExtendedUriInfo(extendedUriInfo);
135        } else {
136            logger.error("Expected ExtendedUriInfo, got {}", uriInfo.getClass().getCanonicalName());
137            throw new InternalServerErrorException("Can't calculate template");
138        }
139
140        return htmlTemplateResult;
141    }
142
143
144    private String calculateTemplateFromExtendedUriInfo(ExtendedUriInfo extendedUriInfo) {
145        String htmlTemplate = "";
146        List<UriTemplate> matchedTemplates = extendedUriInfo.getMatchedTemplates();
147
148        if (matchedTemplates == null || matchedTemplates.size() == 0) {
149            return htmlTemplate;
150        }
151
152        for (int i = matchedTemplates.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
153            String uriTemplate = matchedTemplates.get(i).getTemplate();
154            htmlTemplate += uriTemplate.replaceAll("\\{|\\}", "");
155        }
156
157        if (htmlTemplate.charAt(0) != '/') {
158            htmlTemplate = "/".concat(htmlTemplate);
159        }
160        return htmlTemplate;
161    }
162}
